concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Detailed release notes describe what is new and changed for each release. The defects that are fixed in each release are listed.

conbody.p: Review the release notes for your version before installation or deployment, and before you start to configure or customize IBM CÃºram applications. To find the release notes for your version, click the related link.

section.p: From July 1 2022, Watson Health solutions and resources will be established as a separate company. For documentation updates, see the WH Support Docs site.

link.desc: To see the Release Notes, click this link.
